upgrade_non_player_bonus.name: Monster Rounds
upgrade_non_player_bonus.description: Gain additional {s:NonPlayerBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking Troopers, Neutrals and Bosses.

upgrade_ammo_scavenger.name: Ammo Scavenger
upgrade_ammo_scavenger.description: Any time you secure or deny a Soul you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.

Passive.description: Any time you secure or deny a Soul you get ammo back and gain stacking Spirit Power.

upgrade_chain_lightning.name: Tesla Bullets
upgrade_chain_lightning.description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.

Passive.description: Your bullets have a chance to shock your target. The shock will jump to a nearby enemy.
When your spirit barrier is destroyed, you are empowered, granting {s:BuffDamageMult}x shock damage and increased movement speed

upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.name: Hollow Point Ward
upgrade_hollow_point_rounds.description: When you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

Passive.description: When you are above {s:LifeThreshold}% health, deal additional Weapon Damage.

upgrade_pristine_emblem.name: Pristine Emblem
upgrade_pristine_emblem.description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above {s:EnemyLifeThreshold}% health.

Passive.description: Your attacks have additional Weapon Damage against enemies above {s:EnemyLifeThreshold}% health.

upgrade_stabilizer.name: Stabilizer
upgrade_stabilizer.description: Removes the movement speed penalty while shooting, and increases bullet speed.

Innate.description: Removes the movement speed penalty while shooting, and increases bullet speed.

upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.name: Melee Lifesteal
upgrade_lifestrike_gauntlets.description: Your Melee attacks heal you for {s:LifestrikeHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestrikeHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.

Passive.description: Your Melee attacks heal you for {s:LifestrikeHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestrikeHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.

upgrade_close_range.name: Close Quarters
upgrade_close_range.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

Passive.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when in close range to your target.

upgrade_long_range.name: Long Range
upgrade_long_range.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

Passive.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.
Your bullets apply Movement Slow.

upgrade_inhibitor.name: Inhibitor
upgrade_inhibitor.description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

Passive.description: Your bullets apply Movement Slow and reduce the target's outgoing damage on hit.

upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.name: Soul Shredder Bullets
upgrade_tech_defense_shredders.description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

Passive.description: Your bullets apply a debuff that amplifies your Spirit Damage against the target and grants you Spirit Lifesteal against them.

upgrade_nearby_enemy_boost.name: Adrenaline Rush
upgrade_nearby_enemy_boost.description: Gain bonus Weapon Damage and Fire Rate when there are two or more enemy heroes nearby.

Default.description: Gain bonus Weapon Damage and Fire Rate when there are two or more enemy heroes nearby.

upgrade_dps_aura.name: Heroic Aura
upgrade_dps_aura.description: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.

Default.description: Provides Fire Rate to nearby player minions.

Active.description: Provides bonus Movement Speed and Fire Rate to you and nearby allies.

upgrade_armor_reduction_debuff.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
upgrade_armor_reduction_debuff.description: Your bullets reduce the target's bullet resistance by {s:ResistReduction}% of their current value for {s:AbilityDuration}s and deal bonus damage against bullet shields.

Default.description: Your bullets reduce the target's bullet resistance by {s:ResistReduction}% of their current value for {s:AbilityDuration}s and deal bonus damage against bullet shields.

upgrade_weapon_detention_ammo.name: Detention Rounds
upgrade_weapon_detention_ammo.description: Your bullets build up on enemies, causing them to be tethered to their position.

Default.description: Your bullets build up on enemies, causing them to be tethered to their position.

upgrade_height_advantage.name: Height Advantage
upgrade_height_advantage.description: Gain additional {s:HighGroundBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking targets that are below you.

Innate.description: Gain additional {s:HighGroundBonusWeaponPower}% Weapon Damage when attacking targets that are below you.

upgrade_targeted_silence.name: Silence Glyph
upgrade_targeted_silence.description: Fires a projectile which silences and damages the target. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

Active.description: Fires a projectile which silences and damages the target. Silence does not interrupt channeling abilities.

upgrade_proc_silence.name: EMP Bullets
upgrade_proc_silence.description: Your bullets charge up an EMP on enemy heroes that will prevent targets from using abilities. Victims are immune to emp bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

Passive.description: Your bullets charge up an EMP on enemy heroes that will prevent targets from using abilities. Victims are immune to emp bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

Active.description: For the next {s:AbilityDuration}s, all your bullets immediately apply Silence. Silence prevents targets from using abilities.

upgrade_proc_disarm.name: Disarming Bullets
upgrade_proc_disarm.description: Your bullets disarm enemies, them preventing them from shooting their weapon. Victims are immune to disarming bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

Passive.description: Your bullets disarm enemies, them preventing them from shooting their weapon. Victims are immune to disarming bullets for {s:ImmunityDuration}s after application expires.

upgrade_berserker.name: Berserker
upgrade_berserker.description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

Default.description: Your Weapon Damage increases as you take sustained damage.

Passive.description: While you are below {s:LowHealthThreshold}% health, you gain stat bonuses.

Your bullets temporarily steal Max HP from enemies. Enemies regain their stolen health when the debuff expires. Permanently steal one stack of health if a siphoned target dies and lose {s:StackLostPerDeath} stacks if you die.

upgrade_headshot_booster.name: Headshot Booster
upgrade_headshot_booster.description: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

Passive.description: Deal bonus Weapon Damage with headshots.

upgrade_sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
upgrade_sharpshooter.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

Passive.description: Deal additional Weapon Damage when beyond a minimum distance from your target.

upgrade_headhunter.name: Headhunter
upgrade_headhunter.description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.

Passive.description: Landing a headshot deals bonus damage, heals you for a portion of your Max HP, and briefly grants you bonus move speed.
Headshots reduce target's Bullet and Spirit Resist.

upgrade_proc_tech_damage.name: Magitech Rounds
upgrade_proc_tech_damage.description: Your bullets also deal your base bullet damage [{s:BaseDamagePerShot}] as spirit damage. Magitech Rounds receives {s:SpellAmplificationMultiplier}x amplification from Spirit Power. Shotguns split the damage between each pellet. This effect can only happen once every {s:ProcCooldown}s.

Default.description: Your bullets also deal your base bullet damage [{s:BaseDamagePerShot}] as spirit damage. Magitech Rounds receives {s:SpellAmplificationMultiplier}x amplification from Spirit Power. Shotguns split the damage between each pellet. This effect can only happen once every {s:ProcCooldown}s.

upgrade_crackshot.name: Mystic Shot
upgrade_crackshot.description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

Default.description: Your next bullet deals bonus Spirit Damage.

upgrade_critshot.name: Lucky Shot
upgrade_critshot.description: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus damage and Slow on hit.

Default.description: Your bullets have a chance to be empowered, causing them to deal bonus damage and Slow on hit.

upgrade_close_quarter_combat.name: Point Blank
upgrade_close_quarter_combat.description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

Passive.description: When in close range to your target, gain Weapon Damage and your bullets apply a Movement Slow.

upgrade_toxic_bullets.name: Toxic Bullets
upgrade_toxic_bullets.description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

Default.description: Your bullets build up a Bleed on enemies, causing them to lose a percentage of their current health over time. Also applies Healing Reduction on the bleeding target.

upgrade_drum_magazine.name: Drum Magazine
upgrade_drum_magazine.description: Provides a large ammo bonus, and increased reload speed

upgrade_ricochet.name: Ricochet
upgrade_ricochet.description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

Default.description: Your bullets will ricochet on enemies near your target, applying any bullet procs and dealing a percentage of the original damage.

upgrade_tech_armor.name: Spirit Armor
upgrade_tech_armor.description: Reduces the damage you take from Spirit abilities.

upgrade_vampire.name: Bullet Lifesteal
upgrade_vampire.description: Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies. Half as effective vs Non-Heroes.

upgrade_double_jump.name: Double-Jump
upgrade_double_jump.description: Allows you to perform an additional jump in mid-air.

upgrade_health_regen_aura.name: Healing Aura
upgrade_health_regen_aura.description:
Automatically provides a burst of healing to yourself and nearby friendlies every {s:HealInterval} seconds.
Effect does not stack.

Passive.description:
Automatically provides a burst of healing to yourself and nearby friendlies every {s:HealInterval} seconds.
Effect does not stack.

upgrade_combo_breaker.name: Combo Breaker
upgrade_combo_breaker.description:
Remove all debuffs and heal yourself.
Can be used while stunned.

Active.description:
Remove all debuffs and heal yourself.
Can be used while stunned.

upgrade_debuff_reducer.name: Debuff Reducer
upgrade_debuff_reducer.description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Passive.description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration.name: Debuff Remover
upgrade_reduce_debuff_duration.description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Passive.description: Reduces the duration of all negative effects applied to you.

Active.description:
Purge all negative effects currently applied to you. If any effects were removed, gain a movement speed bonus.
Cannot be used while Stunned or Slept.

upgrade_high_impact_armor.name: High Impact Armor
upgrade_high_impact_armor.description: Provides protection against high-damage bullets. Any bullet damage portion above the threshold is reduced by {s:DamageReduction}%.

upgrade_slow_immunity.name: Unstoppable - Deprecated
upgrade_slow_immunity.description: Purges any roots and chains on use and makes you immune to slows for the duration

upgrade_weapon_power_and_health_drain.name: Overdrive
upgrade_weapon_power_and_health_drain.description: Increase your Courage while draining your own health.

Active.description: Increase your Courage while draining your own health.

upgrade_active_bullet_shield.name: Shield Rush
upgrade_active_bullet_shield.description: Give temporary bullet shield for you and nearby allied Heros and their minions.

Active.description: Give temporary bullet shield for you and nearby allied Heros and their minions.

Passive.description: Increases your forward movement speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s

upgrade_ablative_coat.name: Ablative Coat
upgrade_ablative_coat.description: Provides Bullet Resist but you lose some each time you take Weapon Damage. Loss can only happen once every {s:StackLossFrequency}s. Bullet Resist is restored when out of combat.

Passive.description: Provides Bullet Resist but you lose some each time you take Weapon Damage. Loss can only happen once every {s:StackLossFrequency}s. Bullet Resist is restored when out of combat.

Innate.description: Increases your forward movement speed over time. If Ablative Coat is reduced to 0 Bullet Resist, taking damage will reset the effect for 1.5s

upgrade_metal_skin.name: Metal Skin
upgrade_metal_skin.description: Become immune to bullets and melee attacks.

Active.description: Become immune to bullets and melee attacks.

upgrade_healing_booster.name: Healing Booster
upgrade_healing_booster.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by {s:HealAmpRegenPercent}% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by {s:DegenResistance}%.

Passive.description: Increases the effectiveness of your healing by {s:HealAmpRegenPercent}% and increases your resistance to healing reduction by {s:DegenResistance}%.

upgrade_chonky.name: Fortitude
upgrade_chonky.description: After not taking damage for {s:RestoreDelay}s, gain {s:HealLifePercentOutOfCombat}% Max Health Regen.

Passive.description: When you are above {s:HealthThreshold}% health, you have bonus Weapon Damage and Movement Speed.

upgrade_damage_recycler.name: Leech
upgrade_damage_recycler.description: Reduces the effect of enemy applied healing reduction.

upgrade_bullet_damage_reduction_aura.name: Weapon Jammer
upgrade_bullet_damage_reduction_aura.description: Reduces the Fire Rate of all nearby enemies.

Passive.description: Reduces the Fire Rate of all nearby enemies.

upgrade_sprint_booster.name: Sprint Boots
upgrade_sprint_booster.description: Increases your forward movement speed over time. Taking damage resets the effect for 1.5s

upgrade_cardio_calibrator.name: Enduring Speed
upgrade_cardio_calibrator.description: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.

Passive.description: Reduces the effect of enemy Movement Slow.
Increases the number of Air Dashes and Air Jumps that can be performed before landing from 1 to 2

upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.name: Hunter's Aura
upgrade_bullet_armor_reduction_aura.description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

Passive.description: Reduces nearby enemies' Bullet Resist and Fire Rate. If there is only one enemy hero nearby, this effect is tripled.

upgrade_camouflage.name: Camouflage Suit
upgrade_camouflage.description: Go invisible and maintain invisibility by not moving or attacking. Taking damage will not reveal the Hero. Bonus Regen while Invisible.

upgrade_regenerative_armor.name: Regenerative Armor
upgrade_regenerative_armor.description: Gain a short burst of health regeneration when taking bullet damage from heroes

upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.name: Combat Barrier
upgrade_regenerating_bullet_shield.description: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

Passive.description: While you have a Bullet Shield, gain Weapon Damage and Fire Rate.

upgrade_magic_shield.name: Enchanter's Barrier
upgrade_magic_shield.description: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

Passive.description: While you have a Spirit Shield, gain bonus Spirit Power and Cooldown Reduction.

upgrade_tech_overflow.name: Spiritual Overflow
upgrade_tech_overflow.description: Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.

Passive.description: Gain bonus Spirit Power by charging up with your bullets on enemy heroes.

upgrade_return_fire.name: Return Fire
upgrade_return_fire.description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

Active.description: Automatically fire a bullet towards any attacker who damages you with their abilities or weapon.

upgrade_tech_range.name: Improved Reach
upgrade_tech_range.description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

upgrade_magic_reach.name: Mystic Reach
upgrade_magic_reach.description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Increases the range and effect radius of your abilities and items.

upgrade_extra_charge.name: Extra Charge
upgrade_extra_charge.description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

Innate.description: Adds one to your ability max charges.

upgrade_health_stealing_magic.name: Spirit Lifesteal
upgrade_health_stealing_magic.description: Your spirit items and abilities heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal. Heals for less on Non-Heroes and does not work on buildings.

upgrade_disarm.name: Drain Will
upgrade_disarm.description: Fires a projectile which reduces the Fire Rate of the target and steals Spirit.

Active.description: Fires a projectile which reduces the Fire Rate of the target and steals Spirit.

upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.name: Bullet Resist Shredder
upgrade_bullet_resist_shredder.description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

Passive.description: Reduces Bullet Resist on enemies when you deal Spirit Damage.

upgrade_tech_bleed.name: Mystic Reverb
upgrade_tech_bleed.description: Imbue an ability to apply slow in a radius around the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

Passive.description: Imbue an ability to apply slow in a radius around the target and deal an additional percentage of the damage dealt to enemies around the target after a short delay.

upgrade_magic_burst.name: Mystic Burst
upgrade_magic_burst.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.

Passive.description: Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.

upgrade_magic_shock.name: Improved Burst
upgrade_magic_shock.description:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for {s:ReProcLockoutTime}s after taking damage from it.

Passive.description:
Abilities deal bonus Spirit Damage if they deal {s:MinimumDamage} damage or more in a single hit.
Targets are immune to the effects of Improved Burst for {s:ReProcLockoutTime}s after taking damage from it.

upgrade_arcane_medallion.name: Arcane Medallion
upgrade_arcane_medallion.description: Whenever you deal {s:MinimumDamage} Spirit damage or more in a single hit against an enemy hero, gain temporary Spirit Power.

Passive.description: Whenever you deal {s:MinimumDamage} Spirit damage or more in a single hit against an enemy hero, gain temporary Spirit Power.

upgrade_magic_vulnerability.name: Mystic Vulnerability
upgrade_magic_vulnerability.description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

Passive.description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Spirit Resist reduced.

upgrade_healbane.name: Healbane
upgrade_healbane.description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

Passive.description: Your Spirit Damage applies Healing Reduction. If an enemy hero dies under this effect, you receive a large heal.

upgrade_magic_slow.name: Mystic Slow
upgrade_magic_slow.description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Movement Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

Passive.description: When the target takes Spirit Damage, they have their Movement Speed and Fire Rate reduced.

upgrade_escalating_exposure.name: Escalating Exposure
upgrade_escalating_exposure.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

Passive.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies a stacking Spirit Amp that increases your Spirit Damage to the target.

upgrade_magic_tempo.name: Improved Cooldown
upgrade_magic_tempo.description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

upgrade_cooldown_reduction.name: Superior Cooldown
upgrade_cooldown_reduction.description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Reduces the Cooldown of your abilities and items.

upgrade_duration_extender.name: [Deprecated] Duration Extender
upgrade_duration_extender.description: Increases Duration of your abilities and items by {s:NonImbuedBonusDuration}%.

Passive.description: Increases Duration of your abilities and items by {s:NonImbuedBonusDuration}%.

upgrade_slowing_tech.name: Slowing Spirit
upgrade_slowing_tech.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies Movement Slows to your target.

Passive.description: Dealing Spirit Damage applies Movement Slows to your target.

upgrade_containment.name: Slowing Hex
upgrade_containment.description:
Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

Active.description:
Deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets movement and dashes. Also Silences their movement-based items and abilities.
Does not affect target's stamina usage.

upgrade_withering_whip.name: Withering Whip
upgrade_withering_whip.description: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

Active.description: Target an enemy to apply Fire Rate Slow and reduce their Bullet Resist.

upgrade_rescue_beam.name: Rescue Beam
upgrade_rescue_beam.description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

Active.description: Heals a target allied hero and yourself for a percentage of Max Health. Once while healing, you can Pull the target towards you. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_personal_rejuvenator.name: Rebirth
upgrade_personal_rejuvenator.description: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.

Passive.description: Respawns the hero at the spot they died.
If you die, after {s:RespawnDelay}s you will respawn at your death location with partial health.

upgrade_long_range_slowing_tech.name: Omni Spirit
upgrade_long_range_slowing_tech.description: Applies a movement slow to enemies when dealing spirit damage.

Passive.description: Applies a movement slow to enemies when dealing spirit damage.
Adds bonus damage for every hero hit from your spirit damage mods or abilities and applies a movement slow.

upgrade_tech_cleave.name: Quantum Chimaera
upgrade_tech_cleave.description: Your Tech attacks strike additional nearby enemies for 75% of the total damage.

Passive.description: Your Tech attacks strike additional nearby enemies for 75% of the total damage.
Charged abilities have {s:BonusChargedAbilityDamage}% increased damage and {s:BonusChargedCooldownReduction}% reduced cooldown.

upgrade_rupture.name: Decay
upgrade_rupture.description:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.

Active.description:
Reduces healing received of targeted enemy and inflicts damage over time of their current health.
Decay's damage is non-lethal.

upgrade_discord.name: Discord
upgrade_discord.description: Apply an aura around enemy or friendly target that damages enemies in the radius and suppresses their healing by {s:HealAmpReceivePenaltyPercent}%. If cast on a friendly, it also heals them.

Active.description: Apply an aura around enemy or friendly target that damages enemies in the radius and suppresses their healing by {s:HealAmpReceivePenaltyPercent}%. If cast on a friendly, it also heals them.

upgrade_aoe_tech_shield.name: Spirit Barrier Pulse
upgrade_aoe_tech_shield.description: Temporarily gain spirit barrier for you and all nearby allied units.

upgrade_target_stun.name: Knockdown
upgrade_target_stun.description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a {s:StunDelay}s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action.

Active.description: Target is knocked down and Stunned after a {s:StunDelay}s delay, interrupting and temporarily preventing them from taking any action.

upgrade_phantom_strike.name: Phantom Strike
upgrade_phantom_strike.description: Teleport to an enemy target, applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

Active.description: Teleport to an enemy target, applying Disarm, Slow, and dealing damage.

upgrade_warp_stone.name: Warp Stone
upgrade_warp_stone.description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.

Active.description: Teleport straight ahead, gaining Bullet Resist.
Throw a vacuum grenade, pulling all enemies into a small area where they remain tethered.

upgrade_ability_refresher.name: Refresher
upgrade_ability_refresher.description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.

Active.description: Reset the cooldown of all your abilities and restore all your charges.
Reset the cooldown of your most recently used non-ultimate ability.

upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.name: Torment Pulse
upgrade_tech_damage_pulse.description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.

Passive.description: Periodically deals Spirit Damage to the closest two enemies nearby.
Releases a periodic pulse, damaging nearby enemies.

upgrade_cloaking_device.name: Cloaking Device
upgrade_cloaking_device.description: Become invisible. Nearby enemies will temporaily reveal the hero. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility for {s:AbilityCooldown}s.

upgrade_cloaking_device_active.name: Shadow Weave
upgrade_cloaking_device_active.description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.

Active.description: Become Stealthed. Whenever you take damage while Stealthed you get briefly revealed.
Attacking or using an ability will end your stealth and start an ambush, temporarily granting you bonus Fire Rate and Spirit Power.

upgrade_zipine_mastery.name: Zip Line Mastery
upgrade_zipine_mastery.description: Zip line speed accelerates and allows you to use neutral zip lines and capture them while zip lining. Provides a movement speed bonus when jumping off a zip line whose duration increases the longer you are on the zip line.

upgrade_fire_rate_aura.name: Fire Rate Aura
upgrade_fire_rate_aura.description: Provides a Fire Rate increase to you and nearby teammates. Different bonus to non-Heroes

Passive.description: Provides a Fire Rate increase to you and nearby teammates. Different bonus to non-Heroes

upgrade_weapon_overdrive_clip.name: Overdrive Clip
upgrade_weapon_overdrive_clip.description: Deal non-lethal damage based on your max health to yourself and reload bullets in your clip equal to your max ammo, no matter how many bullets are left. The bullets in this clip have additional courage.

Active.description: Deal non-lethal damage based on your max health to yourself and reload bullets in your clip equal to your max ammo, no matter how many bullets are left. The bullets in this clip have additional courage.

upgrade_rocket_boots.name: Majestic Leap - Disabled
upgrade_rocket_boots.description: Launch yourself high into the air. Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if damaged by enemy Hero.

Active.description: Launch yourself high into the air. Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if damaged by enemy Hero.

upgrade_rocket_booster.name: Majestic Leap
upgrade_rocket_booster.description:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if attacked by enemy Hero.

Active.description:
Launch yourself high into the air. While in the air, you can use the active again to drop down faster.
Cannot be used for {s:InteruptCooldown}s if attacked by enemy Hero.

Launch straight up high into the air. While in the air you will pause your aerial movement for {s:AssaultDuration}s. During this time you gain +{s:AssaultLifestealPercent}% bullet lifesteal, unlimited clip, +{s:AssaultFireRate}% fire rate, and bullets that explode in a {s:ExplodeRadius}m radius.

upgrade_health_nova.name: Health Nova
upgrade_health_nova.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional {s:HeroTargetBonus}% per ally.

Active.description: Heal yourself and nearby allies. Heals an additional {s:HeroTargetBonus}% per ally.

Passive.description: When an enemy uses an ability within {s:Radius}m range from you, store one Restoration Stack.

Active.description: Consume all stacks to heal target ally. If used at max stacks it replenishes a stamina point on the target. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_health_stimpak.name: Healing Rite
upgrade_health_stimpak.description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

Active.description: Grant Regen and Sprint Speed to the target. Gets dispelled if you take damage from enemy players or objectives. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_infuser.name: Infuser
upgrade_infuser.description: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.

Active.description: Gain Spirit Power and Spirit Lifesteal.

upgrade_savior.name: Divine Barrier
upgrade_savior.description: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast.

Active.description: Provide the target with Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Movement Speed. Can be self-cast.

upgrade_aoe_smoke_bomb.name: Smoke
upgrade_aoe_smoke_bomb.description:
Give you and teammates invisibility and a movement speed bonus. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility.
Cast delay: {s:AbilityCastDelay}s.

Active.description:
Give you and teammates invisibility and a movement speed bonus. Attacking or taking damage will remove the invisibility.
Cast delay: {s:AbilityCastDelay}s.

upgrade_thermal_detonator.name: Alchemical Fire
upgrade_thermal_detonator.description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

Deals {s:NonHeroReductionPercent}% less DPS vs non-heroes.

Active.description:
Throw a flask that explodes on contact, creating an area that does increasing Spirit Damage per second and causes enemies to receive additional Weapon Damage from your team.

Deals {s:NonHeroReductionPercent}% less DPS vs non-heroes.

Passive.description: Removes the Movement Speed penalty while shooting.

Active.description: Gain bonus Movement Speed and Ammo.

upgrade_kinetic_sash.name: Kinetic Dash
upgrade_kinetic_sash.description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.

Passive.description: Your next Dash-Jump does not cost an extra stamina and you gain Fire Rate and bonus Ammo until your next reload. Lasts up to {s:AbilityDuration}s.

upgrade_weapon_eater.name: Weapon Eater
upgrade_weapon_eater.description:
Reduces Courage by {s:BaseBonusCounter}.
Gain {s:WeaponPowerPerKill} Courage (Up to {s:MaxWeaponPower}) for killing an enemy Hero but lose {s:WeaponPowerPerDeath} gained Courage on Death. Bonus applied if damage was done within {s:KillWindow}s of enemy killed.

Default.description:
Reduces Courage by {s:BaseBonusCounter}.
Gain {s:WeaponPowerPerKill} Courage (Up to {s:MaxWeaponPower}) for killing an enemy Hero but lose {s:WeaponPowerPerDeath} gained Courage on Death. Bonus applied if damage was done within {s:KillWindow}s of enemy killed.

upgrade_weapon_instant_reload.name: Reloader + Huge Clip
upgrade_weapon_instant_reload.description: Press the [Reload] key while reloading to instantly finish your reload

Active.description: Protect against all spirit damage and debuffs.

upgrade_unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
upgrade_unstoppable.description: Suppress negative status effects and become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.

Active.description: Suppress negative status effects and become Immune to Stun, Silence, Sleep, Root, and Disarm.

upgrade_colossus.name: Colossus
upgrade_colossus.description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

Active.description: Gain Bullet and Spirit Resist, and slow the movement and dash speed of enemies nearby. Your model size grows by 20%.

upgrade_cold_front.name: Cold Front
upgrade_cold_front.description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

Active.description: Release an expanding ice blast that deals Spirit Damage and Slows targets it hits.

upgrade_aoe_silence.name: EMP Grenade
upgrade_aoe_silence.description: Throw a grenade that silences enemies and lowers their spirit resistance.

Active.description: Throw a grenade that silences enemies and lowers their spirit resistance.

upgrade_self_bubble.name: Ethereal Shift
upgrade_self_bubble.description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. Afterwards you instantly reload and gain bonus Spirit Power.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to cancel early.

Active.description:
You enter a void state and become untargetable and invincible for a short duration, during which you cannot move or perform any actions. Afterwards you instantly reload and gain bonus Spirit Power.
Press [{s:in_mantle}] to cancel early.

Creates an EMP aura around you and become invincible for {s:AbilityDuration}s, during which it has {s:MoveSpeedMax}m/s move speed and cannot attack, use abilities, or use special moves. Can be self cast.
If the Stasis lasts the full duration, it will stun and damage nearby enemies.

Passive.description: Your bullets charge up an EMP on enemy heroes, preventing them from using abilities.

upgrade_quarantine.name: Quarantine
upgrade_quarantine.description: Quarantine an enemy Hero, making them invincible but also silencing and disarming them.

Active.description: Quarantine an enemy Hero, making them invincible but also silencing and disarming them.

upgrade_glitch.name: Curse
upgrade_glitch.description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

Active.description: Curses an enemy - interrupting, Silencing, Disarming, and preventing item usage.

Passive.description: Your spirit damage slows your target's movement.

upgrade_arcane_extension.name: Duration Extender
upgrade_arcane_extension.description: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Increases the Duration of your abilities and items.

upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.name: Superior Duration
upgrade_imbued_duration_extender.description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

Innate.description: Increases the duration of your abilities and items.

upgrade_glass_cannon.name: Glass Cannon
upgrade_glass_cannon.description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

Passive.description: Each hero kill grants permanent Weapon Damage (up to a max of {s:MaxStacks} times). Death results in the loss of 1 stack.

Active.description: Grants Lifesteal, Fire Rate, and Ammo. This added Ammo is not limited by your max magazine size.

upgrade_mod_disruptor.name: Soul Disruptor
upgrade_mod_disruptor.description: Throw a grenade that explodes on contact and applies silence and increasing amounts of damage to each enemy.

Active.description: Throw a grenade that explodes on contact and applies silence and increasing amounts of damage to each enemy.

Innate.description:
Your bullets heal you for a percentage of the damage they deal to enemies.

When an enemy is below {s:LowHealthPercentThreshold}% health you gain an additional {s:LowHealthLifeStealPercent}% Bullet Lifesteal against them.

Passive.description:
Nearby enemies take increased damage from bullets.

If an enemy hero dies under this aura, you gain +{s:KillBonusMoveSpeedPerStack} m/s. This effect lasts until you die and can be stacked up to {s:MaxKillBonusMoveSpeedStack} times.

upgrade_burst_fire_actuator.name: Burst Fire Actuator
upgrade_burst_fire_actuator.description: Your weapon fires an additional percentage of your gun's starting clip as a burst. If all bullets in a burst connect with an enemy Hero, gain temporary Base Bullet Damage for the rest of the clip.

Passive.description: Your weapon fires an additional percentage of your gun's starting clip as a burst. If all bullets in a burst connect with an enemy Hero, gain temporary Base Bullet Damage for the rest of the clip.

upgrade_boxing_glove.name: Lifestrike
upgrade_boxing_glove.description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for {s:LifestealHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestealHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.

Passive.description: Your Melee Attack applies Movement Slow and heals you for {s:LifestealHealPercent}% of the Melee Damage dealt plus {s:LifestealHeal}. This heal is {s:NonHeroHealPct}% effective vs non-heroes.

upgrade_acolytes_glove.name: Spirit Strike
upgrade_acolytes_glove.description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

Passive.description: When you perform a Light or Heavy Melee attack against a hero, deal extra Spirit Damage with the attack and reduce the target's Spirit Resist.

upgrade_melee_charge.name: Melee Charge
upgrade_melee_charge.description: Increases your Heavy Melee charge distance. When you perform a Heavy Melee attack against an enemy, your weapon reloads instantly.

Passive.description: Increases your Heavy Melee charge distance. When you perform a Heavy Melee attack against an enemy, your weapon reloads instantly.

upgrade_charmed_wraps.name: Charmed Wraps
upgrade_charmed_wraps.description: Your abilities get their cooldowns reduced when you perform a heavy melee attack against a hero (or two light melee attacks within {s:LightMeleeTimeWindow}s).

Passive.description: Your abilities get their cooldowns reduced when you perform a heavy melee attack against a hero (or two light melee attacks within {s:LightMeleeTimeWindow}s).

upgrade_belt_fed_magazine.name: Belt-Fed Magazine
upgrade_belt_fed_magazine.description: Your weapon gains a much larger magazine that requires spin-up time, starting with a slower initial fire rate and becoming faster over the spin-up time.

Default.description: Your weapon gains a much larger magazine that requires spin-up time, starting with a slower initial fire rate and becoming faster over the spin-up time.

upgrade_diviners_kevlar.name: Diviner's Kevlar
upgrade_diviners_kevlar.description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

Passive.description: Upon casting an ultimate ability gain temporary Bullet Shield, Spirit Shield, and Spirit Power.

upgrade_stabilizing_tripod.name: Stabilizing Tripod
upgrade_stabilizing_tripod.description: Disarm yourself to toss your weapon to the target location where it transforms into a Field Sentry that will attack enemies using your weapon with an unlimited clip. You can melee the sentry to end the effect early.

Active.description: Disarm yourself to toss your weapon to the target location where it transforms into a Field Sentry that will attack enemies using your weapon with an unlimited clip. You can melee the sentry to end the effect early.

upgrade_burst_fire.name: Burst Fire
upgrade_burst_fire.description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

Default.description: Briefly gain Fire Rate and Move Speed when one of your bullets hits an enemy hero.

upgrade_magic_clarity.name: Clarity
upgrade_magic_clarity.description: On ability or item use, gain a move speed bonus for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Your next ability cast will remove the move speed bonus and apply a Spirit bonus to that ability.

Passive.description: On ability or item use, gain a move speed bonus for {s:AbilityDuration}s. Your next ability cast will remove the move speed bonus and apply a Spirit bonus to that ability.

upgrade_magic_storm.name: Surge of Power
upgrade_magic_storm.description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed.

Passive.description: Imbue an ability with permanent Spirit Power. When that ability is used, gain bonus Movement Speed.

upgrade_suppressor.name: Suppressor
upgrade_suppressor.description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

Passive.description: When you deal Spirit Damage to enemies, you also apply Fire Rate Slow.

upgrade_quick_silver.name: Quicksilver Reload
upgrade_quick_silver.description: Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.

Passive.description: Imbue an ability with bonus Spirit Damage on the first hit. When the ability is used, your weapon is reloaded and has a Fire Rate bonus for that clip.

upgrade_arcane_eater.name: Arcane Eater
upgrade_arcane_eater.description: Your bullets Steal Spirit Power from enemy Heroes. Steal {s:HeadshotBonusSteal} extra Spirit Power with Headshots. This effect stacks.

Passive.description: Your bullets Steal Spirit Power from enemy Heroes. Steal {s:HeadshotBonusSteal} extra Spirit Power with Headshots. This effect stacks.

upgrade_predator_precision.name: Predator Precision
upgrade_predator_precision.description: Gain additional weapon damage against enemy Heroes that are low health

Passive.description: Gain additional weapon damage against enemy Heroes that are low health

upgrade_intensifying_clip.name: Intensifying Magazine
upgrade_intensifying_clip.description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

Passive.description: Increases Weapon Damage as you continuously fire your weapon.

upgrade_reinforcing_casings.name: Escalating Resilience
upgrade_reinforcing_casings.description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

Passive.description: Grants Bullet Resist when your bullets hit an enemy hero. Each shot can only grant one stack.

upgrade_veil_walker.name: Veil Walker
upgrade_veil_walker.description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Movement Speed, restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields, and grants bonus Fire Rate for your next magazine.

Passive.description: Walking through a cosmic veil grants you Stealth, increased Movement Speed, restores all Bullet and Spirit Shields, and grants bonus Fire Rate for your next magazine.

upgrade_vex_barrier.name: Reactive Barrier
upgrade_vex_barrier.description: Automatically deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

Passive.description: Automatically deploy temporary Bullet and Spirit Shields when you are movement locked, Stunned, Chained, Immobilized, or Slept.

upgrade_medic_bullets.name: Restorative Shot
upgrade_medic_bullets.description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

Default.description: Your next bullet will heal you based on what target you hit.

upgrade_active_reload.name: Active Reload
upgrade_active_reload.description: While reloading, pressing [{s:key_reload}] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

Passive.description: While reloading, pressing [{s:key_reload}] during the highlighted portion will instantly finish your reload and grant you Fire Rate and Bullet Lifesteal.

upgrade_magic_carpet.name: Magic Carpet
upgrade_magic_carpet.description: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.

Active.description: Summon a Magic Carpet that will fly you away and gain Bullet and Spirit shields.  Cannot use abilities while the carpet is being summoned.  While flying you are immune to slows and doing any action will dismiss the carpet.
